message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. This way we both get a good amount to begin with.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, considering the inflation. We can still both get a decent amount, and I believe this is a better starting point for negotiation.
Let's split it evenly this time. We both lose value with each round, so a 50/50 split seems the fairest option now.
